Embrace the Mess
ARO's library Journal About

Research messiness manifesto

February 09, 2026

You do not know when you will come across something that can be interesting to your research. During my vacation in Chile (my origin country) I came across this argentinian poster meanwhile I was scrolling on Instagram. It says “La obra es sobra del proceso” (translated to english means: The art piece is the rest of the art process). It is a bit difficult to translate it because it has a word game with obra and sobra. This poster was published by one of my favorite stores in Argentina: Quora. It is located in San Telmo a beautifull neighborhood in Buenos Aires. This store
